[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/basic/id_match.c

This inheritable contains all the code to deal with matching objects in the parser.

Written by Pinkfish.

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/obj_parser.h

Method index

is_matching_object(string *, object, class obj_match_context)
This method is used by upper objects that only wish to match the ids and not mess with all the context stuff.
parse_match_object(string *, object, class obj_match_context)
This code is for the new parser.
query_no_all()
This method returns the no all flag's current value.
set_no_all(int)
This sets the no all flag.
update_parse_match_context(class obj_match_context, int, int)
This method updates the context.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
parse_match_object
mixed parse_match_object(string * input,
object viewer,
class obj_match_context context)
This code is for the new parser... It returns an array which contains two elements. The first is the type of the match, plural or singular, and the second is the object it matched. Usualy this_object() but it can be used to swap new objects.

Parameters:
input - the input string
viewer - the person viewing the object
context - the contex this is to be taken in
Returns:
({ type, ob }), 0 on failure
query_no_all
int query_no_all()
This method returns the no all flag's current value. If this flag is set to true then the object will not respond to 'all' requests and must be accessed with it's real name.

Returns:
the current value of the flag

Protected Functions

These are functions that only objects inheriting the class can access.

is_matching_object
int is_matching_object(string * input,
object viewer,
class obj_match_context context)
This method is used by upper objects that only wish to match the ids and not mess with all the context stuff. This method will return a combination of OBJ_PARSER_MATCH_SINGULAR and OBJ_PARSER_MATCH_PLURAL.

Parameters:
input - the input string
viewer - the person viewing the object
context - the contex this is to be taken in
Returns:
the singular/plural match flags
set_no_all
void set_no_all(int no_all)
This sets the no all flag. If this flag is set to true then the object will not respond to 'all' requests and must be accessed with it's real name.

Parameters:
no_all - the no all flag value
update_parse_match_context
int update_parse_match_context(class obj_match_context context,
int num,
int singular)
This method updates the context. It returns the number of the objects we match, and you pass in the number of objects that we are.

Parameters:
context - the context to update
num - the number of objects
singular - return from is_matching_object
Returns:
the number of matched objects
